title: Turkeyâ€™s President appoints crypto professor to Monetary Policy Committee
description: In a recent move by Turkey’s President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, Professor Fatma Ozkul, renowned for her expertise in crypto assets and blockchain technology, has been appointed to the country’s central bank Monetary Policy Committee. The appointment was confirmed through a presidential decree released on December 22. Background and expertise Professor Ozkul, a lecturer at Istanbul’s […]
